briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Bexagliflozin Compared to Placebo as Add-on Therapy to Metformin in Type 2 Diabetes Subjects
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate Bexagliflozin in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Who Are Not Adequately Controlled by Metformin Alone

arms.label: Bexagliflozin Tablets, 20 mg; High Glycemic Group

summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of bexagliflozin compared to placebo as an add-on therapy to metformin in lowering hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) levels in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in HbA1c at Week 24 for Double-blind Group
